website_summaries.verdict: A highly sophisticated desk lamp with a myriad of user-friendly options. The best buy on the market.
pros: A LED lamp with a long life and a tremendous range of lighting choices
cons: Neck is not as flexible as some other choices

website_summaries.verdict: Similar quality and features to the Vont for a lower price. A solid choice if you want the best deal available.
pros: A sleek design and swivel mechanism
The position of the on/off button is convenient and easy to locate, even in the dark
cons: The brightest light setting seems a bit dim
Not quite as flexible as costlier models we tested

customer_reviews.title: Evrething perfect
customer_reviews.text: Im a nail tec this is the best ligth i but best prive and very verygood product
customer_reviews.author: Yulena Yebra

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I use the lamp to help with my bead art so, I can see the numbers/symbols. The photo I posted "I did not use my flash" I wanted to show how bright the lamp is. I love that it has different options "the light can change from very bright to a soft light depending what you need. It has a phone charger too. I definitely recommend this lamp!!
customer_reviews.author: Myreviews

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic light integrating high efficiency led technology! Has many light settings, can adjust brightness, and even has a USB for phone charging. Also a very sturdy metal base with included cloth for cleaning. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Double You

customer_reviews.title: Actual Color Temperature not to Advertised Specs
customer_reviews.text: Light is important to me because it helps sets the mood and atmosphere. Soft, golden light feels the "warmest" and coziest. It was for this reason that I decided to purchase this lamp; however, this lamp does not produce the warm light I desired. The advertised color temperature ranges indicate this lamp will produce a soft, golden yellow light. The manufacturer's video imply this, too. But it does not. Every mode is a variation of white. I returned the lamp for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Benson W

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!! Good luck with returning this light! Hot to the touch half the light quit and it smells like it is burning!!
customer_reviews.text: The lights cannot be replaced and the light itself is very cheap. I have had this light for a little over a year and now it is starting to smell like it is melting. Also, half of the lights have stopped working. This light is not cheap so buyer beware! "Please contact the seller directly for warranty information for this product. You may also be able to find warranty information on the manufacturer’s website." Amazon wants nothing to do with this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Product Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not worth $40! The "touch" buttons don't sense my touch half the time, and the joints are so loose that it is impossible to position the light where I want it. I would expect such quality from a $10 light at Walmart. You get one star because the LEDs are nice.
customer_reviews.author: khd

customer_reviews.title: Best asset to my office since Covid
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I expected to buy. I needed a lamp that didn’t take up a lot of space, but could really illuminate a work area. Really needed 2, but this was so non-traditional I decided to buy just one and see whether I liked it. BIG HIT. The brightest mode is great for working, but the warmer light is better for when I need to light myself up for a Zoom meeting to balance the light from a north-facing window. The warmest setting, which is labeled “sleep,” I find the most comfortable when working after dark. Really love this lamp—and I did buy a second one, so we didn’t have to fight over it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Young

customer_reviews.title: Huge design flaw
customer_reviews.text: The lamp produces really good light, but it has a huge design flaw. The bulbs stick out of the bottom of the lamp, instead of being recessed into it. It is very hard to position the lamp in such a way that the bulbs don't get in your line of sight, blinding and annoying you. If I hadn't thrown the box out, I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. Works great for doing homework, background lighting, reading, or just being a lamp in general. Unlike the other lamps like this, this one features a rotatable head so you can Achieve the perfect angle. My only complaint would be that the blue light on the control pad is constantly on, which can be annoying at night. Also, the USB port does not put out a lot of power, so I would not rely on it solely for charging your devices.
customer_reviews.author: Ex-techie

customer_reviews.title: The light is perfect for desk!
customer_reviews.text: It has been such a great and useful lamp for my desk! The brightness can get very bright and light up everything you need to! At times I find myself wanting an even lower brightness setting, what I do address this is that I close the lamp, and since the lamp has an opening when you close it, it reflects/ diffuses the light off the wall and makes it easier on my eyes/ less bright ! I also love the usb outlet it has, I connect my mini fan to it and works wonders! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Reyes

customer_reviews.title: My second one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp almost 6 years ago for my desk, and I love it. I work(ed) from home as a computer programmer and it was perfect. I never even realized that it had a USB charging port. A few weeks ago, my antique heirloom Tiffany-style bedside lamp died and, although I loved it for its looks and its sentimental value, I had to admit that it was never a good light source. While I was deciding between having it re-wired, or replacing it with another "decorator" style lamp, I moved my TaoTronics desk lamp to my bedside table and, of course, it was perfect! So I ordered a second one, and I regret not having done that sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Good / UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 4/24/2019: The company was nice enough to send me a replacement item, which worked out of the box. Leaving 4 stars only because of the initial issue with the product. However, I do appreciate the response from the company and their willingness to ensure customer satisfaction! --------------------------- I purchased this item in January 2017. Today, all of a sudden, controls grew the mind of their own. They react not to the pressing of the buttons (on/off/dimmer/timer, etc.), but to the hand being waved in front of them - as if they are photo-sensitive themselves. Not sure if manufacturer/seller has the ability to address this under warranty or to support their reputation.... Leaving this as a question in the open.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Using this at my computer desk (which is in the bedroom) for when the wife is sleeping but I need some light. All of the modes work well and are bright enough to get what I need to do done. I mainly use the sleep mode on the lowest setting at night. If you want to further restrict the light, partially close the lamp. The effect turns it into an almost night light. USB port works well; I am using it for the charger for my wireless gaming headset. The base has enough room to put some small miscellaneous items on it. The high gloss black does leave fingerprints, if you're a picky person
customer_reviews.author: Grimlet

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Quality: Decent. Definitely not as sturdy as the Satechi LED desk lamp. A few bucks more, I would invest into the Satechi. Works great though! All mode works great. Color of LED is great. Very easy and fun to use. I would say that the response and function is a lot smoother and quicker than the Satechi. Design: Definitely not as sleek as the Satechi LED desk lamp. The edges arent clean and sleek. A few bucks more, I would invest into the Satechi. Seems to be a cheap knock off. USB slot on the side instead of the back with isn't too slick, but a lot more convenient to use compared to the other designs.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp for college!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my desk in my dorm room, and I love it very much! It's very sturdy and not inclined to fall over if you bump into it, and looks very sleek and fashionable. I really like that it has four different light tones varying from bright white to more yellow which is very comfortable if you're reading at night. You can also adjust the brightness settings. The touch panel makes it super convenient. The LED lights are arranged in a long strip which I like because it spreads the light over a wider area than a single light source, so you can study with the room's lights off and you won't miss a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Li

customer_reviews.title: Worked but only for four months
customer_reviews.text: I'll start this off by saying that I loved this lamp. Past tense. I started using it in college around September 2016 and as of today, January 30,2017, the buttons stopped working. The light is on in the bottom right corner but the lamp will not turn on. I've unplugged it multiple times but it still won't turn on. I'm very disappointed since this light was wonderful, so bright and adjustable. I'm not sure what I'm going to do, I hope the manufacturer holds true to the warranty and sends me a return email.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp, Great Company making this Lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I hesitate to write a review which shows I had a problem with my first lamp, but I believe it is important for potential buyers (you) to know that in the rare event that you have a problem, you count on TaoTronics being there to solve your problem. Problem: The touch panel started giving me strange or no response after I moved it across the room to a second position I had owned the lamp for five months. Best service I have encountered ever on Amazon. Quick, personal and accurate solution to my problem. Personalized e-mail messages were used to get information about where to send back problem lamp. TaoTronics sent me a brand new one, pronto. Thanks, TaoTronics.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: works great and so many settings available
customer_reviews.text: I like this light a lot. I have since bought 2 more. It only requires a gentle touch to turn it on or off, and to adjust the settings. The angle of the light is totally adjustable and it folds flat against the stem when not in use. The description says 4 light modes, 5 settings. But that means that there are 5 settings for each mode! There is also a 60-minute timer for it to turn off. This is a way cool light! Speaking of cool, since the light bulbs are LED, there is no heat generated. This was, for me, an excellent investment.
customer_reviews.author: Born on a Monday

customer_reviews.title: One of my better purchases here on Amazon, very happy with my purchase !!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this light and it was packaged perfectly. Each part of the light had a clear plastic sheet on it to protect it. Each piece was sitting in a block of protective material and packed in tightly. Light worked great and I had no problems with it. There is no setup, just plug in and enjoy the 4 different type of light output. I see no problem with the light lasting a long time and it comes with a registration paper for 18 months more of coverage. Just go online and fill out the info. Great product and so far reliable company.
customer_reviews.author: Hammerhead1

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp! Perfect for my desk.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lamp for my desk and liked the settings this one had, plus the charging ability for my phone. I liked the style also. Well, I got it and love it! It has four settings (and those can be adjusted even more by the (+ and -) buttons. The lamp is adjustable angle wise and tilt also. If you like this style of light, then this is a perfect desk or nightstand light. 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Functional with FULL support
customer_reviews.text: While it's not really pretty to look at, it is ergonomically useful. The base is heavy enough so it won't fly across the room easily, and the rocker arm, while not fully mobile, affords some adaptability to widen and lessen the coverage field. Its LED light color ranges from quite yellow to mostly blue with an effective dimmer. It is not particularly decorative, but works well confined to a desk or other reading situation. Generally pretty good but probably won't win any beauty pageants. Tao Tronics subsequently provided excellent support and a full refund without any real complaint. How then could I justify taking away stars?
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Baysinger

customer_reviews.title: The very best desk top, hobby table, reading area, bedside, or ANYWHERE lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best desk top, hobby table, reading area, bedside, or just ANYWHERE lamp. The lamp's movable arm, adjustable light, small footprint, excellent/clear/clean light is extraordinary. I have ordered them now, four times, and have gifted a few with rave appreciation from family members. Don't buy any other lamp.....just go straight to this one. You won't be disappointed. And no, I was not paid, nor did I receive a free lamp.....just VERY satisfied with this product and am sharing the word.
customer_reviews.author: DB2014

customer_reviews.title: The first was so good I bought three more!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are fantastic. They provide a good amount of varying degrees of light from mild to "holy crap, why did I look at it again". Not only that, but I was happy enough with the first one I got for my work desk, I picked one up for my wife's home work area and my bed side lamp was replaced. The low light setting (Sleep Mode) makes a great night-light when folded down for my kid's room too and it's easy enough for them to turn off in the morning when they get up. Well... the seven year old since the younger one can't reach it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A.

customer_reviews.title: REVISED REVIEW FOR TABLE LAMP
customer_reviews.text: The base is too big and the light itself has a long elbow like neck. Just not a good design. Right now it's under the desk, not being used. Too late to return it. REVISED REVIEW The seller contacted me and offered me another lamp which totally suits my purpose. I would definitely do business with this seller again. They certainly made me happy. The new lamp is just what I needed for the space I have. There is even a phone charger outlet so I can charge my phone. Thank you TAOTRONICS for your response and product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Napolitano

customer_reviews.title: great led light nice purchase.
customer_reviews.text: at the first time i think the lamp its to big but i analyze myself if the lamp was small you are gonna have uncomftable because you need to approach the lamp to you and you don't need that because you can't move your hands well thru the computer it's perfect that size also it's not bother you at all because you can put in a side bed dresser to read or any compact desk like me i used in my bedroom to do works proyects. led its very bright also don't consume to much electricity. save $$$.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this lamp. Not nearly as expensive as many others, but it works well. I like the selectable light outputs - medium is good for most of my tasks. It "remembers" your last used level and returns to it when you turn the light on the next time. The unit has plenty of forward overhang to get the light over my work area (from a small raised hutch at the back of the desk), and its angle is adjustable enough to keep the light on the desk without shining in my eyes. The USB output is handy for charging my cell phone. Great value, great light.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Inexpensive and well made. - Controls are nicely laid out and work well. - Lamp is bright enough to use in my office and for some crafting. - USB port on the side for additional charging options! Cons: - None really though I'll give some suggestions to the manufacturer. - Add a 2nd USB port on the lamp. - When you close up the lamp (bringing the head down) it should turn off the lamp. - Consider adding a small motor to the light so that you could turn it on and the light unfolds into an on position.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: For the money I was pleasantly surprised when I set this up. It looks like it could sell in an upscale store for twice what I paid for it. I purchased it as a piano light. For that task I need to use it on the lowest light setting which was unexpected. I had been afraid I wouldn't have enough light. Changing from warm to cool lighting is nice, too should I decide to use it for other purposes. I have not used the sleep mode, nor the USB charging port.
customer_reviews.author: Cliffmac

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for 3.5yrs until it stopped turning off
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Generally view as a good reading lamp at an attractive price. The various color temperatures and brightness levels are why I bought it and it has been great in that regard. Biggest issue is about a month ago (Jan ‘20; purchased in ‘16) the light stopped turning off all the way. Basically when hitting the “off” switch it will turn to the lowest brightness setting on the most yellow color. I haven’t figured out a way to fix this other than plugging it into a power strip and turning off the power on the strip. Other than this issue the light has been great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for our nephew going off to college two weeks ago. He raved about it. I bought one for my home office replacing big old clunker desk top with swinging and folding arms, std or LED screw in bulb. This TaoTronics is first rate. Came in a very nice packaged box...base is heavy, arm is ultra light. Four modes are great. I easily folds down and out of the way if needed. I will look at buying a 3rd one...for my high level night stand by my bed for reading.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect compact desk light
customer_reviews.text: The TaoTronics LED Desk Lamp is the perfect light for any desk. With the multiple settings of how bright the LEDs are, the yellow, or how soft the light is, is a great addition. If you're eyes are sensitive to bright lights, the lowest setting helps tremendously. Maybe you are trying to relax with a softer light when reading a book, there are plenty of options. The light is very compact, so as to not take up that precious desk space, and can be folded into its self and stored when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Montana M.

customer_reviews.title: This product cost $28 six months ago.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is great. I have one for my home office and my work office, but my husband keeps using the one from my home office. Now that I'm forced to work from home during the pandemic, I thought about getting another, but $40 is a pretty steep price for a lamp, especially considering it cost considerably less only six months ago. I think I'll just get a cheapo, traditional lamp instead.
customer_reviews.author: EBGB

customer_reviews.title: These very adjustable lamps, both in brightness and in configuration, make new office desk and lighting configuration as a whole
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the first TaoTronics Dsk Lamp with USB charging I was sufficiently pleased that I immediately ordered another. I had recently finished assembling and positioning a Regency SOHO L-shaped desk with smoked glass surfaces purchased through Amazon. I have placed one TaopTronics lamp to cover one side of the desk and the second to cover the other side. I placed one lap at the junction of the arc that joins the two straight sections and the other lamp at the other junction. The lamps provide excellent adjustablle lighting the full length of the sectiohns.
customer_reviews.author: Cal70, graduated from UC Berkeley in 1970 after returning from Vietnam in the same year.

customer_reviews.title: I never thought I would like a lamp this much!
customer_reviews.text: I have to read a lot for my new job. To help my ADHD, it helps me to turn off the overhead lights and use a desk lamp to illuminate my papers - I don’t get distracted as much with other things. This lamp got so many good reviews that i decided to try it. And I’ve never been so pleased with a lamp! It provides plenty of light and then some. I love the different modes and brightnesses. I can plug my phone cord into it. And best of all, it swivels nicely and folds up when I don’t need it, so it’s never in my way. This is a fantastic lamp, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Home office perfection
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, slim design does not take up much room (I have a relatively small work space). Like that there are more than one lighting choice, and that it has a USB charging port. I can talk on phone and charge it at same time. Great little lamp. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CocoLoco

customer_reviews.title: If you need a lamp choose this one
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this lamp. The size is perfect for my bedside table, the different modes, the shape and angle adjustment, color, everything. This is my third one, the first one my husband took for his office because he needed to study more than I did (he was in school and I had already finished). The second somehow wound up in his office so now I have my very own again for my side of the bedroom. I will probably get one more for my office. I highly recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Ravennann

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly Base
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. I needed a basic LED lamp, but didn't need all of the crazy features, but whatever. What I don't like is the wobbly base. I followed the instructions, tightening it as much as possible, and it's still wobbly and doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Terry

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I feel ....
customer_reviews.text: Just not a fan of LED lighting Big base - bought 2 - bases have to be 8 x 8” Lots of different setting but the height of the lights really doesn’t allow for a great throw of the beam Just. It sure whether to return them or not Update 5/21/20 - I have actually returned these : couldn't get them to work for me - the angle of the light head didn't allow enough movement for this not to shine in my eyes regardless of position. Probably just me.
customer_reviews.author: Dav Mag

customer_reviews.title: This works great as a piano lamp!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a music teacher, and I needed a new piano lamp. With the sudden switch to online lessons due to the pandemic, I also needed a way to keep my devices charged during lessons. This lamp solved both issues - I get the lighting I need, and it has a USB port for charging devices. I bought this lamp in March, and it has worked fantastically. In fact, I would recommend this over a standard piano lamp. It's adjustable, for one, and also has different lighting settings. Very versatile! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: it does what its suppose to do. Light does not generate lots of heat due to brightness. Good light! great value ! The only issue will be when (long ways away) the bulbs start dying off you cant replace them but youll need to invest in ANOTHER lamp. Cant be fixed......thats LED for you
customer_reviews.author: namrats

customer_reviews.title: This lamp gives me zero problems and still has excellent function! This is an EXCELLENT bedside lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'm a light sensitive sleeper. I get blackout curtains because if there's a full moon out. I chucked my old led lamp because of a small blue power light that I couldn't turn off. This lamp gives me zero problems and still has excellent function! This is an EXCELLENT bedside lamp. White and orange light options plus a wide range of brightness settings make this a lovely bedside lamp. Then there's a USB besides! It really works very well a and setup is a breeze. There is a small red power light that stays on but it's actually tolerable and is bright enough to see in the dark without being distracting while trying to go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Lamp works great. I love that you can adjust the brightness and warmth of the light. The USB port is nice for plugging in my phone while I'm at work. The price of this lamp is excellent. When we looked at buying them from our vendor they were much more expensive. I had purchased a very similar one from this company a few years ago for use at home and it is still working great. I would definitely recommend this lamp and brand.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyeTx

customer_reviews.title: The best desk lamp for it's price
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is high quality and reliable for it's price. It is one of the best things I ever bought for my desk. It have 4 different modes: Reading which is not to strong for the eyes and white light. The second mode is studying which is 100% white light and make you focus which is great for me. The third mode is for relaxing which is a mellow light somewhere between white and yellow and very relaxing for the eyes. The fourth mode is for sleeping and this mode gives 100% orange color light. Also you can adjust the angle the way you like.
customer_reviews.author: AMG722

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt sure about this buy at the first, needed something desperately for my spouse who is in grad school. Ordered this after seeing good reviews. As in all the reviews, the product is great. I am falling in love with the night light. Ever since I got this, I have it running through the night (as night light) and when I study, I just hit the touch sensitive button to go to the reading / studying mode. The arm which can be moved / rotated is very helpful, coz, if the light is affecting those that sleep behind me, I just adjust it without any hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Aswinkumar

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a 20yr old desk lamp. I love this thing. The 4 lighting modes are a serious upgrade from the 3-way bulbs I'm used to. I didn't even realize that I could control the level of brightness. I didn't think I would need/use the usb port, but I actually used it the other day. The base of the lamp is big enough to hold my samsung smart phone with no problem. Easy to put together and adjust to your liking. My teenager is coveting my lamp.....not gonna happen buddy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Banks

customer_reviews.title: because I love natural light
customer_reviews.text: I have a desk lamp that has a CFL bulb that shines golden. It's okay but wasn't enough for the corner of my room where my desk sits. I wish there was a window closer, because I love natural light, so since there isn't, I bought this. And I love it. The light is white and pure and bright. There are four settings, and the first two (reading and studying) are nice and bright and perfect for what I want this for. I like the size and how it leans in various directions.The base is sleek and sturdy. I'm very glad i purchased this. When my bedside lamp dies eventually, I'll buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn F

customer_reviews.title: VERY BRIGHT TO SOFT LIGHT, TIMED TURNOFF, MULTIPLE COLOR TEMPS
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and used it on my hobby work table to assemble parts to a machine. I used both the high intensity as well as the low intensity warm light when reading late at night. The bright light appears to be daylight color temp. All positioning directions work fine and stay put once moved. PACKAGING of the product is admirally done. I was so impressed in using it after several weeks I decided to buy a second one since I have a very large surface to illuminate. I recommend it for my use. Timer works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wishful Dreams - Tim Townsend

customer_reviews.title: A great, sleek lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is simple and yet sophisticated. I have this sitting on my desk at work and I get compliments all the time. 3 of my co-workers have ended up purchasing after seeing mine. All the buttons work and the different shade of lights works have been really helpful for my virtual meetings. The USB port is also great. Creates another free port where I can plug in an extra device. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Might Need Pliers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk lamp because you can adjust the light and position exactly the way you like it. Looks just like the picture, very sleek. Assembly is very simple but not easy because it requires a lot of grip strength. This is why some people said it's wobbly. If you don't have the strength to tighten the bolt by hand, then place fabric over it to protect the plastic and use pliers to carefully tighten. Once properly assembled, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Azura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but wished is was brighter for reading fine documents for the office.
customer_reviews.text: Love the touch feature, excellent extension to allow better viewing but being out of the way. I bought this for the office to allow seeing clearly with proper lighting. I can extend it closer to documents while typing on the computer--this allows the lamp base to be out of the way. The touch feature makes it feel classy and the materials are first rate--excellent accessory for the office environment. I wished it was still a little brighter but overall totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MIO

customer_reviews.title: Mant light level options. Great size & function
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this lamp! It is very low profile and does not dominate the workspace. The options for light settings are more than we will ever use. It folds out of the way so nicely! It looks nice & blends in. We love the lighting options and plan to replace all of our LED lamps w/ this lamp. * We have purchased several of these now. Love the options for light levels. I have some in my sewing studio & they are invaluable. Light options are a great help for detailed hand work e.g. beading.
customer_reviews.author: M Krenz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! I use it as a nightstand lamp, and it's perfect. I like the different brightness options and the timer feature is perfect for me. I sometimes will fall asleep reading, and I'd always wake up later because the main room light is on, so this solves that problem. I also love the USB plug on the base so it's convenient to charge my phone without being limited by cord length using a wall plug. The charger is a good speed, and I find it faster than my wall outlet. Overall a great product and I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 years of flawless service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my TaoTronics lamp back in 2016 as part of a deal, because I wanted something with more lighting options especially for computer and electronics repairs. Three years later, despite the hinges loosening up (normal wear), the lamp is still working flawlessly. I admit I am a little bit leery of the USB port with my iPhone, so I tend to use it for charging my Amazon Kindle Paperwhite or any one of my three power banks, and it holds up quite well to such demanding current draw. Very good lamp. I would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: j.yoders

customer_reviews.title: College Student
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this thing is awesome... So many different light settings, so flexible. I used to have one of those standard desk lamps, I can never go back now. If my roommate wants to sleep, and I still have work to do, I can set this on low light and he can sleep comfortably unlike if I used the typical lamp. If I just want to chill in low light, I can! THE OPTIONS ARE LIMITLESS!! and it doesn't take up too much room on my desk!!! As a tech savy college student, this thing is all I could ever ask for ;') buy it if you are on the fence. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Summerville

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works as advertised. I love the multiple brightness levels. I have some other LED lights that are too bright and have no dim feature. I use this at my home office desk and it stays out of the way and angle adjustments are helpful for when I want direct light over paperwork or aimed away for just a little extra light. I can’t speak to how long it lasts as I’ve only had it for about a month, but I do like it. Professional look to. Doesn’t look cheap and cheesy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G

customer_reviews.title: Larger Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was a little larger than I expected it to be. The different settings are nice but I do not really see the difference and feel they are not necessary. After reading the instructions that said do not put in direct light or near a heat source I switched it with another lamp. I had planned on putting near a window which had a radiator underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after 16 months due to wires cutting out.
customer_reviews.text: This was my bedside reading "LED" lamp. Worked great until this week when it shorted out. It's an issue with the neck where you adjust the height of the lame. One star because after careful use it is getting thrown away after only a year and half.....why can't stuff last anymore? POS lamp
customer_reviews.author: Granny Trish

customer_reviews.title: Multi function
customer_reviews.text: 4 Functions - . Each Function (Sleep, Relax, Study and Reading) has different levels of brightness. The sleep function has more of a yellow light (similar to incandescent) which dims to a fairly low setting. Relax, Study and Reading each get successively brighter, each having the 4 brightness settings. 4 Functions each with 4 settings equals 16 different styles of lighting. I use the reading level for Zoom meetings. There are no longer any shadows. In addition, there is a USB charging port, but I have not needed to use it yet, Overall, a great product and great value. Exceedingly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Never Knew A Desk Lamp Could Be SEXY
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I didn't realize how many improvements could be made to the quintessential desk lamp. Shadows all but disappear under the row of lights, which allow color adjustments that are unexpectedly helpful. Not just dim to bright, but cool blues to warm colors relieve eye strain. The USB port is a great advantage. It is counterbalanced to allow a wonderfully long reach. Thank you Tao Tronics!
customer_reviews.author: Free Range Human

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this LED Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fine LED desk lamp. It has a fine complement of white color temp options from warm yellow-white to cool blue-white and 5 levels of brightness. The one-hour timer is a feature I've been using more than I expected. The 14 watts max brightness is a couple of watts more than other lamps in the same price and feature range. I'm very pleased with this lamp and I would buy it again if needed. Thank you for a fine deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Revised Review
customer_reviews.text: My initial lamp came with scratches so I had returned it and found another lamp. (this was back in Aug 2019). Their customer service team contacted me recently and offered me a free replacement! It arrived very quickly in great condition. I appreciate the team at Sunvalley Brands for reaching out!
customer_reviews.author: Ozioma Nwokike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Light, USB port didn't work but was refunded
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this LED light for my computer desk for 6 years now and it still sheds light very well. There are alot of excellent lighting controls that has made it my favorite desk lamp. **Edit** After leaving this review mentioning the problem below, the company reached out to me and provided a full refund! It's rare to find reputable companies like this these days. I won't hesitate to buy from them again.*** Unfortunately, I came back here today on a hope someone has discovered a way to make the USB charging port work and found no help. It never worked right on mine but I wasn't willing to return it because the light worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Space saving, sturdy and satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in good time and was properly packaged. Read the instructions on how to put the lamp together. (Super Easy) With this lamp, I also purchased the extended warranty. I chose this light because it has a square bottom which takes less room on the desk. The base is a sturdy metal. The lamp arm is made of a light plastic and can easily be moved into any desired direction. The brightness of the lighting can be adjusted with a light touch. I have already ordered another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: ZCooper

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying an LED desk lamp. So far it's everything it was advertised to be. The four settings are useful and you can fine-tune the brightness with the +/- controls. The control panel works by touch and is very responsive. The included USB port is handy for charging devices. The light runs cool compared to traditional bulbs and base is weighted enough to provide stability in a variety of positions. I don't really have any complaints at this time. I will update the review later if I have any additional comments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something adjustable, modern, LED, and nice looking at a good price. I LOVE this lamp! The base is large enough to hold my iPhone 7 when I'm charging it, and the side USB port is easy to access. I keep a rolled up cord just for the iPhone, so it looks neat & tidy. I like being able to adjust the "temperature" of the light, using a softer hue when I'm just browsing the net, and a brighter light when I'm doing paperwork. I've gotten so many compliments when visitors see the lamp. Very, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CactusMomma

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Pluses: Easy to assemble. Light weight. Stable base. Pleasant white piano color. Four convenient color shades. Negatives: Prefer slightly brighter, say 600 to 650 lumen. Wish the light head would rotate.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chang

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is more dope than I imagined!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks thin but it is really powerful. I got it for my desk to do my schoolwork. The fact that there are literally levels to the levels of lighting that I can receive is beyond awesome. It spins side to side up and down assembly was super quick. I was just amazed the minute I turned it on. Its everything I wanted and more and it charges my phone so yea its great.
customer_reviews.author: AUBrown07

customer_reviews.title: Power Button Will Stop Working After Two Months
customer_reviews.text: The power button has to be pressed like four time for the product to finally turn off/on. It seems the sensor has stopped working on my power button. I have used it every night for the past two months.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be brighter.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my desk at work. I have a north-facing office and it's forever too dark. Pros: This lamp is quite good for reading and ambient lighting. I love that you can set it to different light temperatures and brightnesses. It has a usb outlet for charging your phone. The base is heavy enough that it does not tip over despite having a long arm at the top. Cons: My only criticism is that I do wish that it got a tad brighter. If brightness is really important to you, I'd suggest looking at the higher end models. But overall it does the job for me. Bonus: It's sleek and attractive, unlike the majority of desk lamps!
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Works great, super stylish, but I want to be able to balance the colors of the lights myself.
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. It's nice and bright, it bends pretty smoothly and the 360 rotation is great! I think this lamp is priced well and works great. I only wish that you could customize the light's colors yourself. It's current settings are kinda like stark white, less white, white with a hint of gold, and then super gold. I'd like to be able to make my own balance of the colors. Like have two more sets of up and down arrows for "amount of white" and "amount of gold". That would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, adaptable design.
customer_reviews.text: This light is great on my work bench. I purchased it on sale and it was an excellent value. The usb port is perfect for my phone and speaker, and all of the different light settings make it adaptable to a myriad of applications. The only complaint I have, if you can call it that, is I wish it had a longer articulating arm to place the light more directly above me for delicate work with fiddly parts and soldering. That's not the light's fault, it's a great piece.
customer_reviews.author: OneThirtyEight

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for me!!
customer_reviews.text: This little light is just perfect for me when using the computer. My 80 year old eyes are not what they use to be. I LOVE the fact that this light fits perfectly over the to of the monitor I use and is just the perfect light for me!! This is the 3rd lamp I've bought, trying to find one that works well for me. THIS IS THE ONE!! Thank you. Susan Ferrell
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dennis Winters-Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, modern, and useful
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple lamp for the desk in my new office. The adjustability of the kind of light is okay, but reminds me of my mom's makeup mirror from the 1970s. I tend to keep it brighter, on "Study" mode. Otherwise, the real strength here is on the ability to swivel and angle the light bar itself. The construction is clearly plastic, if you get right up close to it. No one seems to notice, though, and comment instead on how modern it looks.
customer_reviews.author: TSSN

customer_reviews.title: great small reading light
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about 5 yrs ago and I'm still using it...when I needed more reading light in another space in the house didn't hesitate to buy one again. small footprint, great light for reading in a room with suboptimal light. I have to expect this light will last at least as long as the first one I bought, which again I'm still using after 5+ years. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jjb

customer_reviews.title: A lot for the money
customer_reviews.text: Every product review should keep in mind what you paid for the product. This lamp is a lot of features for the money. First, the packaging- very high quality, kind of Apple-esq. The lamp itself is attractive, well-made and has a very heavy base. There are 4 different lighting modes and each mode has 5 levels of brightness. It just looks great and functions well. The LED's will easily outlive me so I will never need to purchase bulbs again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird

customer_reviews.title: Super!!!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many reviews talking about details, so I don't need to repeat anything. I bought a black one. I am very particuar and picky when purchasing personal stuff. First of all, it has to be usefull and smartly designed. and it has to have elegant or unique look. When I look at this lamp, I can not think any thing to complain. not at all. 100% satisfied. I really admire whoever designed and made this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Happy_Life

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: New Review: I posted the below review and had given it 3-stars, but after follow-up with customer service I was able to receive a new model that was not defective. This lamp is awesome! It has a great transition feature that makes it less abrupt between changes, and I've been loving the working model. Old Review: Expensive, but cool features Pretty cool, but eventually the touchscreen part wears off and you have to press hard.

customer_reviews.title: Taotronics makes good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two different models from Taotronics and just have to say, they're well built, ergonomically designed, pleasing to look at, easy to use, and above all, functional... in short, these products are thoughtfully designed with humans in mind. Whether the height or angle fits your individual needs or not, it's not junk and nice on the eyes (pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: DAMills

customer_reviews.title: Great design, features and really bright
customer_reviews.text: I’m a photographer and it was a pain to pick out a lamp and reading all the reviews drive me crazy. This lamp kept on coming up no matter what search words I used, an hour later I gave up and bought the lamp. It’s super bright, it’s had four light settings plus a dimmer switch, folds up which I use more than I thought I would, rotates as well on base, I really like this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco

customer_reviews.title: No more headaches while studying...
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! Great when working on the computer and homework. Easy to pack, lightweight and I was not happy after the husband left it behind at the hotel, at the end of vacation. But I just logged into Amazon, bought the same exact light and had it in 2 days- thank you Prime!! This light goes with me everywhere that I study- the university library, hotel, camper, vacation destination, work and friend's and family's house. I especially like the fact that I can choose the level of brightness, use it as a night light, and that there are many levels of brightness to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent reader

customer_reviews.title: I loved it so much I had to get one for ...
customer_reviews.text: My workplace ordered these lights for all of us. I loved it so much I had to get one for home use. I like that you can dim it, and has settings for reading, studying and relaxing. I use it a lot for my art work because the arm adjust over my work. Also like that it has a USB port to keep my phone charged up and close at hand. If this light ever dies....I will be buying another one! Wish I'd know about this light a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Susiecubes

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My lamp arrived and it started flickering and problems all a round. Contacted customer support ran some test and they immediately concluded the lamp was bad and they sent a brand new lamp free of charge. This one works to perfection! Great product and even better customer support! What you would expect and more!
customer_reviews.author: JHR

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp w/ useful features
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t know what to expect with this lamp, as I’d never heard of the company and it seemed almost too reasonably priced, but it’s been a great purchase. I bought it for my daughter about 7 months ago and it works perfectly. The sleep function and the ability to adjust both the brightness *and* the color of the light have been very useful features. Now I’m looking for one for myself with all the same features plus wireless charging of my phone. If such a thing exists, I’ll be one happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about efficiency or sleep mode because I turn it off when not in use. However, the design is really nice. I would have liked it to be a little brighter. I use my daughter's light at her house and I was hoping this light would be similar to her's bu it isn't as bright. I really like the red light when not in use. It makes it easy to turn on in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: JANICE

customer_reviews.title: Good For The Price With Two Criticisms
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice desk lamp for the price, but not very durable or deluxe in appearance. The construction is glossy black plastic and the two hinges that join the lamp to the base provide adjustment, but the arm bends well before the hinges move making adjustment a rather in-exact procedure. The controls provide a wide variation in the color and intensity of light, and a USB outlet at the bottom of the arm is handy for recharging IPads and IPhones. However, the power the USB outlet provides is quite low and it can take many hours before an attached device is recharged.
customer_reviews.author: George Pence

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp But...
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a florescent unit whose base broke on me. It was on a switched outlet, so when I came into my office room and flipped the wall switch, the light came on. This is a nice unit, but I will have to change my behavior because that does not work with this unit. When the switched outlet is off, the light forgets whether it was on or off before.
customer_reviews.author: D-C-M

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good light. It works well. I use it more in a desktop/office setting. It is definitely bright enough. I maybe wish it had one more setting that was more of a softer tone than the setting it does have but I was happy with the purchase. It’s maybe a little bigger than I thought it would be as well. It takes up very little counter space but is pretty tall.
customer_reviews.author: JSWP257

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting features and charging port
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lamp. The brightness levels are great. I actually use the warmest setting while putting on makeup so it can mimic the sun so I know when I go outside my makeup won’t look crazy different from my neck and the rest of my body. I love how on each of the lighting settings you can adjust the brightness. I sometimes leave the lamp on the warmest setting and at the dimmest setting because it’s about as bright as a night light. The charging port comes in handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney S

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with switch operated plugs.
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design and OK price. Fair lumen power too. But it doesn't work with switch operated plugs. Returning it. Update 04/10: I did further research and discovered that LED lights with soft power switches can not be controlled with wall switched controlled plugs. So th eissue is not unique to this lamp. Increasing my stars to 4 and keeping the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Barn_Owl

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, adjustable, nearly perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp made a perfect nightstand lamp for a dorm style setup. It adjusts, swivels, and tilts so I can enjoy my own lighting without bothering anyone else. My only complaint is that I wish there was one lower setting than the current lowest setting. Sometimes it seems like the lowest setting is still too bright for comfort. I have not used the USB charger, but it is nice to have that extra outlet ready for small things to charge. The power adapter is dual-voltage, too, as I am using it in Asia. All in all, this lamp was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: hostilejurist

customer_reviews.title: Perf!
customer_reviews.text: This light was exactly what I needed for my desk. I use it pretty much all day and all night and the various settings make it great as I transition my needs. From getting basic work done to browsing FB before bed, this light has been stellar. Size is decent, slim design when out of use and the 180 means I can turn it to either side of my L-shaped desk. Great in black.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Sy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish lamp that works well on a desk, nightstand or end table.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp last year and have since bought two more and have probably "sold" five people on getting one too, each of whom eventually bought a second one too. The lamp has a nice, modern look. It has multiple levels of light for each brightness (hot yellow, bright fluorescent, warm yellow, soft white/yellow) and - this is an underrated part of any lamp - it's easy to see in the dark thanks to a small, red light on the base. The USB port is clutch - a great place to charge your phone overnight if you're using this on an end table.
customer_reviews.author: Art Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bright Light at Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: This product has only one short-coming as far as I can tell. the lamp head does not swivel. It extends up and down but does not rotate on its own axis. I bought a similar lamp (NYXLED) several months back that does swivel and I find that feature very convenient for sitting and reading with the lamp at your side. This lamp has a better base, it is taller and it puts out more light. So, it depends on what's most important to you. This one is great for sitting in the sun room at night where the overhead lights are too dim for my old eyes. It does that and so I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Van Devender

customer_reviews.title: Company stands behind its products.
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Company contacted me and worked with me to correct the issues I had with the lamp. I am impressed with how they stand behind their product. Intended use as a desk lamp. Construction does not inspire confidence. It is made of what feels like insubstantial plastic, and the plastic arm fits into the plastic base and gets screwed down by a plastic bolt. It works as intended but is not as bright as I expected. I will keep it as it is sufficient, but would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LenGlen

customer_reviews.title: This lamp saved my relationship
customer_reviews.text: I just moved in with my partner. He prefers the awful yellow light to be on when the sun goes down. I couldn't stand it as I am a fan of white light. since this arrived we're both content with the light. Neither of us complains about the light. I'm glad it comes apart and packs easily. We're moving very soon. I can't imagine leaving this apartment without it.
customer_reviews.author: Disabledwoman27

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For studying or general use, this is pretty good for a 14 w LED. I bought 2 of these as lighting for shooting hand-drawn animation frames. For shooting animations I learned it’s not the best light because it doesn’t give strong, even lighting. I think I should just switch to fluorescent for stronger lighting. But good product for non-shooting purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Xueyan Wang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Since we're on lockdown and I'm working from home, I needed a quick solution for my poor lighting - this lamp arrived quickly and the quality is excellent. I love the different settings - I use each of them regularly - I didn't think i needed the timer feature, but it turns out that I use it often. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this desk lamp! Not only does it give light, but the type of light--warmer "yellow" light or cooler "blue" light--can be selected. You can also control how bright or dim the light is. It's attractive and can be bent/manipulated in several ways...AND it has a USB port to charge your phone while you're at your desk. Because I can select the type/color/brightness of the light, I use the lamp for reading, drawing, and for "mood lighting" in my home office. This is a GREAT desk light; I'll be getting one for my work office too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a very nice high quality lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and tried it for a while. Liked it so bought another. Super fast delivery. Very robust packaging. Excellent fit and finish. The light and dimming function are perfect for my application (on the computer desk and now on the workshop table). The dimming also seems to change the color factor removing some blue as it dims. Very nice lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan J.

customer_reviews.title: Newer in this case is far superior in everyway!
customer_reviews.text: These lights were purchased to replace a pair of 2 year old lamps that received extremely harsh treatment. Not only did they meet original expectation based on the old desk lamp they exceeded expectations in every category based on the older lamps. Better light controls, more flexability in lighting colors and better usb charging amperages. A great desk lamp in all categories!
customer_reviews.author: RL-High Desert

product_meta.title: TaoTronics LED Desk Lamp with USB Charging Port, 4 Lighting Modes with 5 Brightness Levels, 1h Timer, Touch Control, Memory Function,14W, Official Member of Philips EnabLED Licensing Program
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackTaoTronics - Enhance Your Life Move forward find your possible enhance your life with TaoTronics 
We help people discover products that address life’s needs and inspire you to enhance your life From home goods to gym essentials and audio accessories move life forward with products designed to match your grit and speed 

Technical Specifications 
Operating Voltage: DC 12V / 1 5A 
Power (for LED panel): 14W 
Lumens: 530 lm 
USB Output: 5W 
Power Voltage: 100V-240V 
Full Range CCT: 2000-5500K 

What's in the Box 
1 x TaoTronics Desk Lamp (Model TT-DL01) 
1 x Power Adapter 
1 x Clean Cloth 
1 x User Guide
feature_bullets: Improved and upgraded LED desk lamp from TaoTronics LED desk lamp brand
Fully rotatable: From the head to the arm to the base, each part can be adjusted for the ultimate lighting coverage
Vision friendly for all eye types, lamp design provides full lighting coverage with no dark areas, ghosting or glare
Match your mood with four distinct lighting modes and five different levels of brightness
Sleek and modern design with touch sensitivity controls and USB output for convenient smartphone or tablet charging

specifications.Included Components: 1 x TaoTronics LED Lamp - 1 x Adapter - 1 x Cleaning Cloth - 1 x Quick Installation Guide
specifications.Specific Uses: For study, relax, reading, For reading room, living room, bedroom
specifications.Special Features: Touch Dimmer, Modern Design, Memory Function, No Glare Reflects on Screen, USB Charging Port, Dimmable, Philips EnabLED Licensing Program
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars12,045 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
